mapper.select: select o.id, t.transaction_id, g.name, g.image, o.number, o.money, u.username, o.address, o.phone, o.remark, o.status, o.create_time, t.create_time as pay_time from orders o left join tran t on o.id = t.order_id join goods g on o.goods_id = g.id join user u on g.user_id = u.id where o.id = #{orderId}

select o.id, g.id as goodsId, g.name as goodsName, u.id as sellerId, u.username as sellerName, u.avatar as sellerAvatar, o.status, o.money from orders o join goods g on o.goods_id = g.id join user u on g.user_id = u.id where g.user_id = #{userId}

select o.id, g.id as goodsId, g.name as goodsName, u.id as sellerId, u.username as sellerName, u.avatar as sellerAvatar, o.status, o.money from orders o join goods g on o.goods_id = g.id join user u on g.user_id = u.id where o.customer_id = #{userId}
